About

Goodness Chijioke is a creative UI/UX designer, with a passion for creating beautiful and intuitive experiences. His portfolio illustrates successful results in web design, mobile app design, branding and other marketing campaigns for clients across multiple industries. He is equally comfortable working independently or as part of an agile team to bring projects successfully from concept to completion. Open for work and eager to join new challenging projects that allow creativity and out-of-the-box thinking in order to deliver high-end digital products.
